description:
Ratchet and Clank 3 is a third person action shooter.
Blast your enemies with over the top weaponry and save the galaxy from total disaster.

v0.1.0.description:
## RaC3 APWorld v0.1.0

**Branch:** main  
**Commit:** 246d69bd  
**Date:** 2025-10-22 19:23 UTC

### Summary
- Set proper workspace root for build script

### Notes
This release was automatically generated from the **main** branch.  
Latest (main) releases are recommended as pre-releases (staging) may contain experimental or in-progress changes.  
**Changelog:** https://github.com/Taoshix/Archipelago-RaC3/commits/main

### If a location is broken and does not get sent out
Go to the server console (locally or via the Archipelago room page) and run:  
`/send_location <player_name> <location>` Example: `/send_location TaoshiRaC3 "Crash Site: Infobot: Aridia"`  
Highly recommended to exclude the "Unstable" location group in your yaml. Like so:
```
  exclude_locations:
    # Prevent these locations from having an important item.
    Unstable: 1
```
Can also plando Progressive RY3N0 to some of the most difficult/lengthy locations:
```
  plando_items:
    # Generic items plando.
    - items:
        Progressive RY3N0: 5
      locations:
        - "Phoenix: Long Term Trophy: Titanium Collector"
        - "Phoenix: Long Term Trophy: Friend of the Rangers"
        - "Phoenix: Long Term Trophy: Annihilation Nation Champion"
        - "Command Center: Dr. Nefarious Defeated!"
        - "Annihilation: Qwarktastic Battle"
```
But this needs items set as allowed in your `host.yaml`. Example:
```
generator:
...
  plando_options: "items, bosses, connections, texts"
```
The attached `Ratchet.Clank.3.yaml` has all this already.
Else you can generate a fresh one with "Generate Template Options" after installing the `rac3.apworld`, and restarting Archipelago.
v0.1.0.title: RaC3 APWorld v0.1.0
